name: Yowler
description: The Yowler is a tiny undead creature with rotten fur and exposed bones, appearing as a magical illusion of its former self, embodying chaotic malevolence.
memorable: Its ability to frighten opponents with a horrid scream sets it apart from other undead.
goals: To terrify foes and sustain itself through fear.
relations: May be accompanied by other undead creatures.
environment: Can be found in dark, eerie places, often lurking in shadows.
strengths: High dexterity and constitution provide agility and resilience.
weaknesses: Very low strength leaves it incapable of dealing physical attacks effectively.
attacks: Its multiattack includes a biting attack that can poison and a claw attack that slashes.
most_powerful_ability: The Yowl ability frightens multiple foes within close range, affecting their combat performance.
senses: It possesses darkvision with a range of 60 feet.
skills: Skilled in stealth allows it to move unseen.
additional_information: Immunity to frightened and poisoned conditions.
Illusion can be disrupted if it attacks or uses Yowl.
Requires successful Intelligence checks to see its true form.
test_queries: tiny undead monster that frightens foes
chaotic undead with a terrifying scream
agile monster immune to poison damage
undead that appears alive with illusion
small creature with high constitution and dexterity
